channel.title: Beer Reviews on Ballard Beer Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Beer Reviews on Ballard Beer Blog

item.title: Reuben's Brews Summer IPA Review
item.description: Summer in Seattle is better than any season in any other part of the country.

item.title: Fair Isle Franz Meredith Review
item.description: One of my favorite things about living in a place with numerous breweries that are generally doing creative things is that I get exposed to a number of rare or historic beer styles.

item.title: Stoup Neck Tats Double IPA Review
item.description: Stoup’s Neck Tats Double IPA is one of my favorite Ballard beers and also one of the best named.
